title: Peanut from the Rox Tigers is the man
body: As much as I love the NA players. He is by far the best Jungler to watch play this year. Watch his games, they have taught me quite a bit about playing, how to properly counter jungle and shot call. Check him out if you haven't already.

replies.body: You can set the settings on the video to have english subtitles in the lower right corner options menu.
yup, you need to activate the subtitles
